repo_notes.content: AI Resume Tailor is a full-stack web application that analyzes resumes against job descriptions using OpenAI's GPT-4. The frontend is built with React + TypeScript + Vite, and the backend is a Flask API. The project demonstrates production deployment with Vercel (frontend) and Render (backend).
repo_notes.author: Project Lead

repo_notes.content: Main application logic is in the client/ folder with React components, pages, and utilities. The server/ folder contains the Flask API with OpenAI integration. Documentation has been consolidated in the docs/ folder with clear phase-based organization.
repo_notes.author: Project Lead

repo_notes.content: Key features include real-time resume analysis, match scoring, keyword extraction, and actionable suggestions. The app is privacy-first with no data storage and includes bilingual support (EN/ES).
repo_notes.author: Project Lead
